snippet: As the United States sought to strengthen its influence in the region, Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel told a rare meeting of regional defense ministers: “We must demonstrate our unity at a critical time.”
abstract: Defense Sec Chuck Hagel, speaking at rare meeting of Gulf Corporation Council, urges Gulf Arab states to unite against security threats; remarks come as the United States seeks to strengthen its influence in region that has been splintering over how to deal with democracy protests in Egypt, uprising in Syria and Iran’s nuclear program.
lead_paragraph: As the United States sought to strengthen its influence in the region, Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel told a rare meeting of regional defense ministers: “We must demonstrate our unity at a critical time.”

headline.main: Hagel Urges Gulf Arab States, Divided Over Policy, to Unite for Security
